mapper.select:
select sn.notice_id, sn.notice_title, sn.notice_type, sn.notice_content, sn.status, sn.create_by, sn.create_time, sn.update_by, sn.update_time, sn.remark, su.user_name as create_by_name from sys_notice sn left join sys_user su on sn.create_by = su.user_id
and sn.notice_title like concat(concat('%', #{noticeTitle}), '%') and sn.notice_type = #{noticeType} and sn.status = #{status} and su.user_name like concat(concat('%', #{createByName}), '%')
order by sn.create_time desc
